A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While I feel this movie did many things right\, I also feel it missed in the most important areas. The tone of the movie felt off for me. The resolution of plot points and build up were disappointing at best. Characters were criminally underused or written poorly. I doubt I will bother to see episode 9 in the theaters as I was disappointed by both 7 and now 8. Fool me once...
